messages.subject: Fwd: Request about News,sorry for the first one.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/03 11:17:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time, kcalnews@cbs.com writes: Sorry about the last post I forgot the attachment.LOL Heres the info on
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/03 11:17:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
kcalnews@... writes:


Sorry about the last post I forgot the attachment.LOL Heres the info on that
school bully site.
>
> CONTROVERSY TONIGHT OVER A WEBSITE RUN BY SOUTHLAND HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS.
> THE SCHOOL BULLY IS NOW IN CYBERSPACE.
>
> THERE IS A WEBSITE RUN BY SOUTHLAND STUDENTS ON WHICH ALMOST "ANYTHING"
> GOES
> FROM GOSSIP TO CRUDE MESSAGES ABOUT FELLOW STUDENTS. THE WEBSITE IS LIKE A
> BIG CHAT ROOM..
>
>
> KCAL 9'S JOEL CONNABLE IS LIVE NEAR THE BEVERLY CENTER WITH MORE ON A
> WEBSITE SOME ARE LABELING "CYBER BULLYING."
>
> www.schoolscandals.com
> *cg name Joseph Fogel
> Attorney
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: RJHill241@... [mailto:RJHill241@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 22, 2003 7:35 PM
> To: news@...
> Subject: Request about News
>
>
> Sent by Rhonda Hill at Apr 22, 2003 10:34 pm:
>
> Today, Tuesday, April 22 on the 12:00 noon news on KCAL9, there was a small
> story on school bullying via the internet. A site was talked about in which
> pupils are bashed via the internet.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
